LanguageData.VehicleEnableButtonTooltip: If disabled this vehicle will not be available in-game. Applies to both the player and NPC factions.
LanguageData.VehicleLaunchFixedMaxDistanceTooltip: Set a fixed max distance this vehicle can fly regardless of fuel level.
LanguageData.VehicleFuelEfficiencyWorldTooltip: Fuel efficiency multiplier applied to flying on World Map.
LanguageData.VehicleFlySpeedTooltip: Speed when flying on World Map.
LanguageData.VehicleRocketsBurnRadiusTooltip: AerialVehicles that launch with Rockets will burn everything flammable in a given radius.
LanguageData.VehicleSettingsDisabledTooltip: Settings have been locked for this vehicle and cannot be modified.
LanguageData.VehiclesModifiableSettingsTooltip:
Toggle Modifiable Settings. Restarting with this disabled will bypass generation of modifiable settings.
Determines whether Vehicles should use values from the mod settings or Defs
